This is a description of the meditation entrainment routine. Use this routine when you want to meditate.
There is no help for this topic.

Entrainment Mode: To start a brain wave entrainment cycle, select the desired sequence from the Entrainment Mode drop down list and tap the Run button to begin. Tap the Stop button to stop the current entrainment cycle and return the cycle to the beginning. Tap the Pause button if you wish to pause the current cycle and resume from that same point later.

Color Mode: To select the color pattern that your PETT will display, select one from the Color Mode drop down list. Use the Speed slider to adjust the rate at which the colors change. The Hold button will freeze the colors at any given point. Tap the Hold button again to resume the animation.

Hint: The brain wave entrainment mode will run with any color pattern you select. For the best results in maximizing the stroboscopic effect, we recommend choosing one of the first 3 Rainbow cycle presets that turn all of the LEDs on full bright, and placing your PETT in a fully darkened room.

Enjoy!
